SKHA Mode Register Values


Defines

#define sah_insert_skha_modulus_128   0x00001e00

Detailed Description

These are bit fields and combinations of bit fields for setting the Mode Register portion of a Sahara Descriptor Header field.

The parity bit has been set to ensure that these values have even parity, therefore using an Exclusive-OR operation against an existing header will preserve its parity.

Define Documentation

#define sah_insert_skha_modulus_128   0x00001e00

Referenced by fsl_shw_auth_decrypt(), and fsl_shw_gen_encrypt().
